game.name: Work Till Die
game.categories: Single-player, Steam Achievements, Keyboard Only Option, Mouse Only Option, Save Anytime, Partial Controller Support, Steam Cloud, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: A visual novel with elements of psychological horror and dark comedy. Stepashka — not just the name of the protagonist, but a whole way of life... But is it a life sentence? That’s exactly what the player will have to decide!
